title: Geraldton Back Doors
description: When a body turns up in the wilderness north of Lake Superior, Kennet Forbes takes it personally. Forbes, a former high-profile investigative journalist, finds himself wading through murder, violence, and drugs. The pursuit of justice dredges up his personal history, and threatens to mire him in doubts about mankind's capacity for goodness. This is the second title in the series with protagonist Kennet Forbes. The first novel was The Beardmore Relics.
author: Edgar J. Lavoie
